issue.title: [CF 559] Command Demon
issue.body:
Command Demon doesnt appear to be working correctly. It likely has something to do with the fact that im using Grimorie of Supremacy, which upgrades all the demons to their new forms, however that seems to be the only spell ID for it.

^1^T^SType^Scooldown ^SName^S119898 ^SEnabled^B ^t^N60101^S~`~| ^Sicon^^


> Posted by CurseForge user jlepage | Imported from CurseForge issue #559 | Raw

comments.body:
It should work if you change the icon type to "Multi-state cooldown".

However, this spell is really confusing me because it isn't transforming to anything when I summon a demon on the warlock I have on the beta. It transformed once when I summoned an imp the very first time after logging in, and having the icon as a multi-state cooldown worked, but the spell itself seems bugged.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Well, the spell seems to work if I mount up, fly in the air, and then land again. Not sure why, but it seems that the spell is bugged on Blizzard's end. Does it work on live servers?

Regardless, it works if you change the icon type to a multi-state cooldown. Just make sure that Command Demon is on your action bars.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Posted instruction on how to set this up over in the Warlock Examples forum.

http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/forum/warlock/42515-command-demon/

Closing ticket now as this is all the support that I will be able to, or that I should need to, provide for this spell. If you do need more help though, feel free to post another comment here.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
